reporting-org.narrative: Centre de recherches pour le développement international
Centro Internacional de Investigaciones para el Desarrollo

title.narrative: Soutien à la phase de démarrage de l'IRCAAA
Support for the CARIAA-Wide Inception Phase

description.narrative:
In October 2013, the Collaborative Adaptation Research Initiative in Africa and Asia (CARIAA) selected consortia to conduct research in the program's three hot spots: deltas, glacier- and snowpack-dependent river basins, and semi-arid regions. Each consortium's mandate includes engagement with other consortia on cross-cutting research themes, as well as participation in program knowledge sharing and monitoring and evaluation activities. Meanwhile, the role of the CARIAA Team will be to lead program-level integration of results, ensuring comparability and coherence in line with the program vision.
In line with these principles, this project will support activities related to a six-month CARIAA-Wide Inception Phase beginning as of the start-dates of consortia's grants in early 2014. During the CARIAA-Wide Inception Phase, the consortia and the CARIAA Team will establish ways of working together in line with the overarching program vision. Outcomes will include agreement on a CARIAA Theory of Change, a monitoring framework, protocols for engaging consortia in program-level decision-making, and strategies for building on potential synergies on cross-cutting themes. Each consortium will be required to submit a Consortium Inception Report including a refined workplan and milestones based on outcomes of the CARIAA-Wide Inception Phase and commitment to agreed upon CARIAA-wide activities for the duration of the program.
The CARIAA Team will convene a series of CARIAA-wide activities to facilitate the discussions and program-level collaboration that will support these outcomes as per the timeline below.
Planned Timeline of Activities:
Early January 2014: First Management Committee Meeting (Conference call with lead institution Principal Investigators)
March 4-7, 2014: CARIAA Inception Meetings in Nairobi, Kenya
Late April 2014: Meeting of Consortium Coordinators (location TBD, potentially in London parallel to London Launch event)
June 2014: Second Management Committee Meeting (Conference Call with Principal Investigators)
June-July 2014: Submission of Consortium Inception Reports to CARIAA *exact submission deadline TBD based on start date of grants
